casebody.data:
CATAWBA COUNTY, et al.
v.
LOGGINS 152PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 10, 2017 Mr. J. David Abernethy, Attorney at Law, Mr. David W. Hood, Attorney at Law, Hickory, for Catawba County (by and through its Child Support Agency), et al. Mr. Blair E. Cody, III, Attorney at Law, Hickory, for Loggins, Jason. Mr. John F. Maddrey, Solicitor General, Mr. Gerald K. Robbins, Special Deputy Attorney *503General, Mr. Benjamin J. Kull, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Department of Health and Human Services.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of March 2017 by Plaintiff to Allow Amicus Curiae to Participate in Oral Argument:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of March 2017."
